short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for visualising bookmarks and tags as a network graph

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebGraph is an extension that visualises your bookmarks as an interactive network graph. It uses D3.js to create a dynamic map of saved sites and user-defined tags, allowing you to see connections between your bookmarks. You can save pages with custom tags and notes, then explore your bookmark landscape through an intuitive interface. Features include search functionality, and customisable layouts, making it easier to organise and rediscover your saved content.

# Data Privacy Policy

This policy outlines how your data is handled when you use my Chrome extension.

1. **Local Storage:** All data associated with WebGraph is stored locally on your device:
    - Your bookmarks, tags, and associated data
    - Snapshots of saved web pages
2. **No Tracking:** WebGraph does not track any of your activities, including:
    - Usage of the extension (e.g., searches, bookmarks, tag creation)
    - Websites visited or browsing history
    - Any personal information
3. **No Data Transfer:** WebGraph does not transfer any of your data to external servers or third-party services. WebGraph's developers have no access to this data and cannot view or modify it.
